alert.note: Alert for Boyle; Garrard; Mercer; Washington (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 8:09PM EDT until June 25 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR MERCER...NORTHWESTERN GARRARD...EAST CENTRAL WASHINGTON AND NORTHEASTERN BOYLE COUNTIES... At 809 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Harrodsburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Danville, Harrodsburg, Junction City, Burgin, Mackville, Alum Springs, Caldwell Manor, Talmage, Faulconer and Riverview Estates. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central Kentucky. This is a dangerous storm, producing large hail driven by severe winds! SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! If you are caught outdoors, cover your head and neck.
